snippet: The Corporate Executive Board, a research and consulting firm, agreed on Monday to buy SHL of Britain for $660 million in cash to add computer-based talent management services to its portfolio.
abstract: The Corporate Executive Board, a research and consulting firm, agreed on Monday to buy SHL of Britain for $660 million in cash to add computer-based talent management services to its portfolio.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Corporate Executive Board to Buy SHL for $660 Million
